# The `AttributorLightCGSCCPass` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A more lightweight version of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> which only runs attribute inference but no simplifications. <a href="#details">More...</a>
